name: Galactic Empires
description:
Galactic empires is a procedurally generated space simulation game, I aim to combine 4x elements with RPG elements similar to a Mount & Blade in space, but with more focus on empire management. 

The current build of the game, which is available to the public demonstrates the unique universes generated and the AI interacting with one another.

Features:
  • Complex trade system with chain of supply
  • Procedural universe
  • Procedural fleet images
  • Procedurally-Dynamic 3D ships
  • Empire Management

The game is currently very barebones and all player focused features have been disabled in the available build, any feedback is welcome.

Thank you for your time.
